user.description:
Set up your Peblar EV charger to integrate with Home Assistant.

To do so, you will need to get the IP address of your Peblar charger and the password you use to log into the Peblar device' web interface.

Home Assistant will automatically configure your Peblar charger for use with Home Assistant.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Peblar charger on your home network.
data_description.password: The same password as you use to log in to the Peblar device' local web interface.
